name: riverbed cardigan
notes:
you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the riverbed cardigan. 

sizes: xs to 4 xl
fit: oversized cardigan with 14" positive ease on the bust circumference.
skill level: confident beginner
yarn: colour theory by lion brand yarn, worsted weight #4
construction: this pattern is worked flat, making panels, so there are no increases and decreases.
the pattern uses standard american terms

i would love to see your finished products
tag me on instagram @cj.dsgn and use the hashtag #riverbedcardigan

refund
there are no refunds on patterns

please note that this pattern can be found for free, with ads on my blog at cjdesignblog.com
